predicate.note: Frames file for 'underlie' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No access to verbnet. Irrelevant comparison to 'lie'.

roleset.name: act as the foundation for

example.name: typical usage
example.text: Speculation, on the other hand, sparked buying in certain incentive-backed issues, though rumors underlying such shares eventually proved untrue.

roleset.note: Ignore adjectival usages like "the underlying causes of the recession."
